definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: They pegged out an area for the construction of a new hotel.
sentences.chinese: 他們用木橛標出一塊地，準備建造飯店。

sentences.english: It is said that the remaining chestnut trees are all offsprings of this tree. Hence, the name of "Chestnut Ancestor".
sentences.chinese: 據說鐵橛山裏的板栗均由此繁生，故名“慄祖”。

definition: ancient weapon with a tip shaped like a hand or claw
branches of a tree/fork of a tree
span (unit of length based on the width of the expanded human hand)/to span (measure with one's hand)

short slender pointed piece of metal, bamboo etc/skewer/prod used to extract samples from sacks of grain etc/(dialect) to stick in/to bolt (a door)/to arrange (flowers in a vase)/to graft (tree)/to pedicure/to peel (an apple etc)
a saw/to cut with a saw
